article_title: When Old Drugs Are Made New Again

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: How can it be that a drug which has been on the market for more than 90 years – and is effective at slowing or even stopping the progression of a common, deadly disease – is still so costly that Americans can lose their eyesight, their kidneys, their limbs, and [...]
